data.title: RISE of the Jack O'Lanterns
data.text:
Long Island's original and most visited fall event, featuring The World's Longest Jack O'Lantern Trail, returns for our 11th season in 2024!

This year, our trail will be more stocked than ever before! We'll have over 10,000 illuminated objects including 7,000 hand-carved jack o'lanterns, 3,000 specialty lanterns, and hundreds of family-friendly Halloween-themed visual displays to bring out the magic of the season on Long Island!

The RISE will be open on only 18 select nights this year between October 4th and October 28th, 2024.

Make sure you fill out the form on this page and we'll email you a promocode so you can get discount tickets BEFORE they sell out!

Then, click here to BUY TICKETS!

Our NEW Long Island Venue, Usdan Summer Camp for the Arts in Melville!

We're excited to be back at our new Long Island venue with our partners at Usdan Summer Camp for the Arts in Melville, located a mere stones throw from the Nassau/Suffolk border. We've done trails in a dozen locations around the country and Usdan's sprawling campus is by far the prettiest and most perfect setting to host the world's most intriguing jack o'lantern experience.

80+ New Displays! Don't miss them!

2024 will be a don't miss year! In addition to the fan-favorite classics we plan to bring back, we'll also be carving up over 80 brand new never-before-seen elaborate multi-jack o'lantern displays! The RISE features more new themes and elements each year than any other similar event. It's no wonder why RISE visitors return year after year to see all of our new creations. Click here to BUY TICKETS!

Prizewinners Return in 2024!

Back by popular demand will be our 100+ pound Pennsylvania and New York-grown prizewinner pumpkins, all hand-painted, hand-carved, and hand-gutted on-site by our talented art pumpkin team. If you want to see the biggest, best, and coolest hand-carved LARGE pumpkins on Long Island, there's only one place - RISE of the Jack O'Lanterns! Click here to BUY TICKETS!

More New Stuff!

Amazing photo-ops on-trail so you can get some awesome shots to light up your Instagram feed.

Dozens of fun videos rolling all around the trail for you to enjoy.

20 Foot Tall singing jack o'lanterns! (really? yes!)

Jack O'Lantern Dance Party - Our dance floor was a big hit last year so we're bringing it back with some all new music, video, and Halloween characters!

Interactive Elements - Kids of all ages will have a blast hopping around on our new color changing jump lights!

Inflation buster! We're bringing back 50% off tickets on select timeslots when you order early. Limited supply. List members only! Sign up on this page now!

Make sure you fill out the form on this page and we'll email you a promocode so you can get discount tickets BEFORE they sell out!

Advanced Tickets are Required!

Tickets are not sold at the door. All tickets are sold here.

All high-demand early timeslots sell out each year, most several weeks in advance, so we recommend purchasing your tickets as early as possible so you can get the date and time of your choice.

Carve for The RISE!

Want to get paid to carve pumpkins? Our on-site carving teams carve thousands of pumpkins from mid-September through October. We're always looking for talented local carvers to add to our carving teams. More info.

Questions?

Please read our Frequently Asked Questions.

Let's Keep in Touch

For additional updates, make sure you fill out the form to get on our email list and follow us on Facebook and Instagram.
